name: Townsville Social Media Marketing
description: Get your business found online today
overview:
http://TownsvilleSocialMediaMarketing.com/ ► helping businesses use online marketing platforms to get traffic, leads and customers. ✆ Phone 0408 361 599

Mission We are dedicated to helping businesses in Townsville and around Australia use powerful new online and mobile marketing platforms to get visibility, traffic, leads, customers and raving fans.

Our formula is simple:

  1. Get out there and get found
  2. Engage with your prospects on their terms
  3. Continue to engage and follow up with them

We accomplish these objectives by applying the latest tools and know-how on behalf of your business.

Description Marketing has also shifted from a one-way broadcast to a multi-point conversation. In the past, communications were “broadcast” exclusively through mass marketing channels like radio, TV and newspapers and junk-mail advertising. With social media, however, much of the communication is controlled by the prospects through services like Facebook and Twitter, which have more than 700 million members combined—and YouTube, which gets 300 million visitors a month. We are passionate about providing social media management, training and coaching to businesses in Townsville and other areas of Queensland and Australia.

http://twitter.com/TvilleSocialMed http://www.youtube.com/TvilleSocialMedia
